1.body: Your adventure begins at the entrance of a tomb

2.body: You enter a shadowy door, upon trudging down you come to a T junction, seeing a left and a right corridor

adjecent.description: There is nothing more to see here, return to the T junction

4.body: You enter a chamber filled with light from an unknown source. In it looks like an ancient altar, surrounded by glittering treasure. However as you move forward to claim it, a mummy moans from behind a column and lurches forward to attack you. Enter combat.

5.body: You have defeated the guardian of the treasure, and it is now yours! **Congratulations**, you are victorious.

6.body: Your body lies broken on the floor, you have been crushed beneith the mummie's powerful blows. The last experience you have on this mortal coil is being heavily dragged towards a waiting open sarcophagus. **You are dead, your adventure ends here.**
